protein.general_function: Involved in serine-type endopeptidase inhibitor activity
protein.specific_function: This inhibitor acts as 'bait' for tissue plasminogen activator, urokinase, and protein C. Its rapid interaction with TPA may function as a major control point in the regulation of fibrinolysis
